data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Nui, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nui, Tuvalu
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 162 believers in Nui to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Nui, Tuvalu.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 530 people in the state of Nui who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Tanrake Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Tanrake Village, Nui, Tuvalu.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Nui.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Nui, Tuvalu honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nui, Tuvalu has a population of 700.

We estimate Nui has 162 people who might know Jesus, 530 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 8 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Nui, Tuvalu the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
